    • createAppointment

      public static void createAppointment​(String title, String desc, String loc, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end, int custId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      Creates an appointment instance in the database
      Parameters:
      title - the title
      desc - the description
      loc - the location
      type - the type of appointment
      start - the start date and time
      end - the end date and time
      custId - the customer id
      userId - the user id
      contactId - the contact id
      Throws:
      SQLException - JDBC encountered an error with the data source
